name: MentorMind
description: Inspired through various diverse academic & professional experiences, it has been the MentorMind team’s long standing mission to improve the practicality of undergraduate education in India & other emerging economies. Hence, was born MentorMind. With a lot of emerging economies undergoing a severe skill crunch, a focused emphasis on practical professional skills is the need of the hour. With multiple iterations made to the initial value proposition, MentorMind was built to be the platform it is today over a a period of 15 months of validation from the Indian undergraduate student market. MentorMind is an online platform where students & young professionals can access & work on real-time work situations in the form of Menternship. These Menternships are procured in collaboration with organisations from various industrial & functional backgrounds. A Simple user interface coupled with game concepts facilitates an engaging experience.
features: Multiple job functions from multiple industries.
Certifications from partner companies, adding to your professional profile.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: Online Mentored Work Experiences - Certified by Top Companies - For the Workforce of Tomorrow!
ShortDescription: MentorMind is on a mission to build equitable access to opportunity for all. We are bridging the skills gap through experiential learning.

Highlights.name: Virtual, Mentored Work Experiences
Highlights.description: MentorMind offers virtual, mentored work experiences that are co-created with top companies [1]. This means that you can gain real-world experience working on real projects with guidance from experienced mentors.

Highlights.name: Build Skills in High-Demand Careers
Highlights.description: MentorMind's programs are designed to help you build skills in careers that are in high demand [1]. They partner with a variety of companies across different industries, so you can find a program that aligns with your interests.

Highlights.name: Co-Created Programs with Top Companies
Highlights.description: MentorMind's work experiences are co-created with top companies, such as Uber and BlueYonder [1]. This means that the programs are relevant to the current needs of the industry and will help you develop the skills that employers are looking for.

enhanced_description: MentorMind is an online platform established in 2017 with a mission to improve the practicality of undergraduate education and bridge the severe skill crunch in India and other emerging economies. It offers 'Menternships,' which are virtual, mentored work experiences providing students and young professionals with access to real-time work situations. These programs are co-created in collaboration with top companies from various industrial and functional backgrounds, such as Uber and BlueYonder, ensuring relevance to high-demand careers. The platform features a simple user interface coupled with game concepts to facilitate an engaging learning experience and provides certifications from partner companies to enhance professional profiles. MentorMind aims to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency through experiential learning, ultimately building equitable access to opportunity for all.
